This is an ISS Tracker made using python.
You will need to install the python packages json, turtle, and urllib.request beforehand as these packages are required.
This project will report the live latitude and longtitude of the ISS.
This project will also report the amount of astronauts on the ISS and Shenzhou 15 combined.
This project will also report which astronauts are on the ISS and which astronauts are on the Shenzhou 15.
It uses turtle to display a map, json to read .json files, and urllib.request to recieve and send http requests.
To use this project, you would import the module, then call the function.
This was made with help from:https://projects.raspberrypi.org/en/projects/packaging-your-code/1
